Detailed Description

Demonstrates use of GPU-based histogram methods in a simple C++ application.

hist_example.cpp

Remarks:
This code has been optimized and tested on nVidia 8800 GTX. If used a different card, the execution configuration (i.e. the number of threads and blocks) may have to be modified from the default value for best performance.
